特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs, interests, numbers and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This high-level, content-based class will include elements of lecture and seminar styles, and will be conducted face-to-face. However, assignments/homework/ assessments will be conducted, and lesson information/resources provided, on Google Classroom. As such, students will need access to a computer at home.

Short lectures will be given by the instructor each week. Students are expected to take notes, as these lectures will introduce the themes of the course. Supplementary readings will be assigned for homework to introduce additional information and deepen students’ understanding. Students will also do further research on these topics.

Students will have to regularly demonstrate detailed and critical understanding of the content of these lectures and readings, as they will form the basis of Written Responses (a kind of weekly test), group discussions, activities and presentations in the following classes. Lastly, students will have to present an original research project on slang usage in their own context.
